00020 #include <iostream>
00021 #include <string>
00022 #include <cppunit/TestCase.h>
00023 
00024 #include <rdkcore/serialization/read.h>
00025 #include <rdkcore/serialization/write.h>
00026 #include <rdkcore/object/object.h>
00027 
00028 #include "utils.h"
00029 
00030 namespace RDK2 { namespace UnitTest { namespace Serialization {
00031     
00032     using namespace RDK2::Serialization;
00033     using namespace std;
00034     
00035     
00043     class SerializationTest2 : public CppUnit::TestCase { 
00044         public: 
00045             RDK2::Object*o; 
00046             Writer*w; 
00047             Reader*r; string file; 
00048             
00049             SerializationTest2(
00050             std::string name,
00051             RDK2::Object*o, Writer*w, Reader*r, cstr file) : CppUnit::TestCase( name ),
00052                 o(o), w(w), r(r), file(file) {}
00053     
00054             void runTest() {
00055                 string buffer1, buffer2; 
00056                 
00057                 try {
00058                      buffer1 = w->serialize(true,o);     
00059                 } catch(SerializationException e) {
00060                     cerr << e.what() << endl;   
00061                     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Exception during serialization", false);
00062                 }
00063                 
00064                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Output is different from file", 
00065                     compareToFile(buffer1, file));
00066                 
00067                 RDK2::Object * o2;
00068                 try {
00069                      Readable *readable = r->deserialize(buffer1);
00070                      CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Null deserialization", readable);
00071                      o2 = dynamic_cast<RDK2::Object*>(readable);
00072                      CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("deserialization not an object?", o2);
00073                 } catch(SerializationException e) {
00074                     cerr << e.what() << endl;   
00075                     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Exception during deserialization", false);
00076                 }
00077                 
00078                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("not same class", 
00079                     o2->getClassName() == o->getClassName()); 
00080                 
00081                 try {
00082                     buffer2 = w->serialize(true,o2);
00083                     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("deserialization+serialization!=identity",
00084                         buffer1==buffer2);
00085                 } catch(SerializationException e) {
00086                     cerr << e.what() << endl;   
00087                     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Exception during second serialization", false);
00088                 }
00089                     
00090             }
00091             
00092     };
00093 
00094 }}} // namespace
